resources.string: To be admitted as a Spotter in the Skywarn Network you need to pass this admittance test. This test consists of 5 questions, all of which you need to answer. Afterwards you will see your score.
I hereby declare my information as correct
What do the four letters in the acronym ACES stand for?
Which of the following tools and/or comparison methods are suitable for reporting hail size? Select all that apply.
A body part such as a hand balled into a fist
A ruler or something else with visible measurements
A common object such as a tube of lipstick
A coin to use as a reference
What qualifies as a Severe Thunderstorm?
A thunderstorm which produces a tornado and large hail (1 inch)
A thunderstorm which produces large hail and windgusts up to 58mph
A thunderstorm which contains a tornado or windgusts up to 58mph and large hail (1 inch)
A thunderstorm which contains a tornado or windgusts up to 58mph or large hail (1 inch)
What does the acronym CAPE stand for? Write the full term in the textbox below.
What is the difference between a funnelcloud and a tornado?
A funnelcloud spins more slowly than a tornado
Funnel clouds form at the front of a storm while tornadoes form at the back
A funnel cloud is usually white-colored while a tornado is dark-colored
Funnel clouds do not reach the ground while tornadoes are in contact with the ground
